globaluserpage-desc: Automatically fetches user pages from a central wiki

globaluserpage-central-editnotice: This user page will be [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:Extension:GlobalUserPage displayed] on other wikis if a local user page does not exist there.
